website_summaries.verdict: Does double-duty as both a tattoo concealer and a nourishing treatment for healing and hiding bug bites, scrapes, scratches, and acne.
pros: Contains healthy aloe, chamomile, green tea, tea tree oil, and vitamin E. Great for concealing minor skin imperfections as well
cons: Although the larger size is a good value, it is still a relatively expensive product

customer_reviews.title: Made a black eye look good as new! This stuff is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is freaking amazing! I took an elbow to the eye in volleyball right before vacation and got a gigantic black eye. This. Was. My. Savior!! I still needed a color corrector and a setting powder, but if you look at my before and afters, you'll be amazed!! Also, I have super sensitive skin, and this did great! I also never wear heavy makeup, so I was worried it'd feel caked on. It didn't and was do light, I'd forget from time to time. I highly recommend this product for any facial blemish you're trying to cover!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F.

customer_reviews.title: This is thee best concealer I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: This is thee best concealer I have ever tried.....You hardly have to us any, it goes a long way. I have dark circles under my eyes, an it works the best of anything I've ever tried in my 60 plus years. I am sold...😎
customer_reviews.author: cathy kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Works better then anything else
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews on this BooBoo Cream, and wasn't lucky enough to get it as a sample. All the reviews seemed so positive, so I ordered it. I bought the medium, and it's too dark, but! It works wonders!! I use it on mosquito bites and the itch stops and they go away in a day or two. I've used it on my legs to cover bruises and veins. It covers very well. I would suggest this to a friend ! It really does work ! I'm so happy I found this!
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Q

customer_reviews.title: Great opaque pigment
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is perfect for undereye dark circles and bruises anywhere. It is very very opaque, and dries to a matte finish (I do use a setting powder on my face, but leave the concealer as-is on body imperfections). The consistency is a little thick, so sometimes I mix it with a little moisturizer. One note about color though: I chose "Light" and it is definitely designed for the palest among us!
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product for tons of different uses
customer_reviews.text: I got this product years ago in a free sample. I noticed that it covered better than so many other concealers that I used for blemishes, pimples and even under eye circles. My teens also started using it to cover their light acne and felt that it covered better and lasted longer than other products they tried. I just ordered a new tube in medium, as my skin tone required a slightly darker shade and I really like it. I'm thinking of ordering another tube to keep in my purse. It's my go to concealer and not just for healing. I use it for any cover up needs
customer_reviews.author: lmpnj64

customer_reviews.title: Good, But Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't do a good job of covering my scar, but I think it's just a matter of it being the wrong shade. This is lighter than my skin and is probably lighter than the skin of most white males. I like the basic idea of a scar-covering concealer that also helps heal - this shade just isn't right for me. It would be nice if they sold a sampler pack of the different shades so I could see which is the best match.
customer_reviews.author: Buysalot

customer_reviews.title: Red or dark age spots gone. Use Q-Tip to feather the edges.
customer_reviews.text: worked perfect to hide dark age spots and red blotches. As a man I'm not great applying this sort of thing but the tiniest amount then feather the edges with a Q-Tip works wonders. Has to be applied every day.I'm sure people that use make up daily have better ways of using this but one tube is going to last over a year... Use less than you think you need. It covers well I m indoors white. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Heartland IndianaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: this shade was a little too light for me but great coverage
customer_reviews.text: i love the creaminess of this product i had originally got it as a highlighter it was a little bit too light for my skin so i ordered the medium which i have used before. i think i got it some time ago in an tipsy bag and wanted to get one again ever since just got my new one in the mail today, it works great for the undereye area if you get tired from working so hard. my best and hope you enjoy. get the light if you are truly fair
customer_reviews.author: Reliable in Nova

customer_reviews.title: Emarrassed no more
customer_reviews.text: I bruise very easily - especially my forearms and hands - a condition my doctor describes as "weak skin." It was to the point that I was ashamed to wear short sleeves and I always covered my bruises in the gym with arm bands and weight gloves. Recently, my daughter told me about Boo-Boo and, then, bought me a very small tube to try. The results were so fantastic that I purchased a larger tube and will never be without this product again. I highly recommend it for anyone who would like to cover a bruise or a discoloration on their skin...It truly woks!
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected For A Scar Concealer
customer_reviews.text: I researched a lot of scar concealers before buying this. I read reviews looked at photos. You must need to do a lot of laying with this product awful coverage. It was not what was expected. Maybe for bruises, but not pitted or deep scars or old scars. Very disappointed with this purchase. Will not buy again. Maybe try Dermaflage or I'm sticking with Dermablend which I have had the best luck with thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Wildroses

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works better than anything else I have tried. Using for eye circles and acne scars. I didnt get the results I hoped for, but maybe I just need to figure out how to work it right. I give it 75% improvement rate, so this is a very good product, just not a miracle concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Damaged1

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this for covering up blemishes or anything you really need covered. It’s very thick so I wouldn’t use it as under eye concealer but it’s amazing for concealing scars, acne, etc. it works well under powder or liquid foundation too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ashley

customer_reviews.title: ... of this in my ipsy box forever ago and loved it! As soon as I was out I ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample size of this in my ipsy box forever ago and loved it! As soon as I was out I was happy to find it here and purchase it right away. It last forever, both on your face during the day and just the makeup itself! It has a really light feel to it and covers any dark or red spots perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: great coverage, but only temporarily
customer_reviews.text: I've got a lot of rosacea and red cysts. I won't go to the mailbox without something on my face. I've used Bare Minerals make-up and concealer for years. But, I was low on $$ so I decided to try this as an alternative. The color was a perfect match. And, just a small drop covers a lot of area. HOWEVER, it wears off, in splotches, within a few hours. So, I'm back to Bare Minerals.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Cat Scratch Cover!
customer_reviews.text: I love my cat. She’s my fur baby, but once you pet her too much she gets a little feisty if you stop. As such, I am left with scratches all over my arms. I have been looking for the right product to cover evidence of my cat’s adoration and I’ve finally found it. This stuff is amazing, covers great and lasts for hours and hours. I use it with Dermablend Setting Powder and they’re a match made in heaven. It’s very light, but so am I so I’m happy as a clam. Just bought 2 more tubes so I won’t run out.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Costa

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great concealer! It doesn’t dry out my skin like other products do. It’s a good consistency—not too thick but thick enough to give all-day coverage. I am very pale and I got the Light shade which matched my skin perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bracker

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK but definitely two steps to spread out and it’s noticeable on the face does not blend well
customer_reviews.text: Longevity will pride be for a lifetime I guess if you’re going to use it maybe on a small spot but it doesn’t spread well and I got the color medium and I still thought it was too late for my skin I’m not thrilled with the product I mixed with face cream to make it work better.
customer_reviews.author: julie Deuel

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Seriously covers so much. I have acne scars and discolored skin, I just apply a small amount to run errands and looks so natural!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concealer. It is easy to apply and contains a good amount of pigment to provide coverage. It also contains ingredients that help heal, so you can cover up a blemish and help it heal at the same time. But this isn't just a coverup for people with blemishes: it also covers other skin imperfections well without making you look heavily made-up. It's a little more expensive than some concealers, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hill

customer_reviews.title: full coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try this concealer as it was recommended to me. I have bad acne so it's hard to get good coverage that's not irritating to my skin - this concealer has crazy awesome coverage and I've had no problems so far! A teeny tiny bit goes a really long way. Will be buying a full tube.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great discovery !!
customer_reviews.text: I found this by chance in a google search of foundations & I am thrilled!!! Covers up like s dream!! A little goes a long way & medium color did the trick, despite my initial hesitation. Usually, my foundations are on the lighter side , though not very light. I like that I am hiding & medicating simultaneously :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as camouflage for injuries, but, after receiving it in an Ipsy bag and using it as concealer, I had to buy it! This is a great concealer for your face. It only takes a minuscule amount and the coverage is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tassy McCormick

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best concealer I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best concealer I've ever used. I use it all over my face as a primer and it does the trick. My search for the perfect concealer is over.
customer_reviews.author: dorfa

customer_reviews.title: One of best products on earth!
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutely nothing like this product on the market. I have searched high and low for a product that I could use on OPEN WOUNDS on my face... Finally found it!! Boo-Boo Cover -Up Cocealer is a one of a kind make up product! I will buy this for the rest of my life!!
customer_reviews.author: KyndleKustomer

customer_reviews.title: Only did an "okay" job.
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I have very dark undereye circles. I was hoping this product would help cover up the dark, but it only did a fair job. The coverage looked great for about 10 minutes before the darkness reappeared. I've yet to find a really good undereye concealer for very dark circles.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Maines, best-selling, award-winning author, actor, and editor

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product especially for sensitive skin like mine! I didn’t have any issues with using this on my face as a concealer, and I have extremely sensitive skin. So, that spoke wonders about this product for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Casey

customer_reviews.title: This is a Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my must haves! I never even realized that it is actually really made for "boo-boo's" if needed. I use this under my eyes as a concealer and highlighter and it is amazing. It takes very little and goes a long way. I received a .13 oz. tube well over a year and a half ago in an Ipsy subscription bag and I only replaced this recently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get a shade slightly darker than you normally would
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit too light and I call myself straight ghost colored 😆 So usually light is perfect. If this is slightly too light for me then maybe it suits a ghost better? Haha but really, it does work well. Just wish it was a touch better at covering up some marks I’m embarrassed about!
customer_reviews.author: Clorinda

customer_reviews.title: BEST CONCEALER EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: The best concealer I have ever found, I've tried tons from ulta and sephora, this is the BEST! It is not shimmery, and it covers everything so well! The color is a perfect match! I chose medium, I'm an olive skin tone and it's perfect for summer and winter. I have a few color match concealers that are supposed to change to match my skin color, this matches way better, even on my sister who usually needs a lighter color than me. AND it really does help heal my boo boos! BUY IT, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great for dark circles!
customer_reviews.text: I had to get the light and medium to mix for my light / medium skin. That being said, I think this is an amazing concealer! I have the worst under-eye circles and this covers them well. Better than most major makeup brands. A little dab goes a long way so I won’t run out of this any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: While slightly pricey, this is by far my most favorite concealer. I tried to use a store brand when I ran out but it never did live up to this brand for my under eyes. I’ve been using this concealer for a few years now.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: ... a mini size in an ipsy bag and I liked it so much I had to buy a full ...
customer_reviews.text: I had originally gotten a mini size in an ipsy bag and I liked it so much I had to buy a full size! I am a makeup artist and this product works great for blemishes!
customer_reviews.author: Dawnell Wilson

customer_reviews.title: this is so insanely tiny
customer_reviews.text: It's about half the size of my pinky finger. Maybe enough to cover "boo-boos" for two days.
customer_reviews.author: minky

customer_reviews.title: Didn't cover up my scars as advertised. I'm using ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't cover up my scars as advertised. I'm using it under my makeup as a concealer and it does work well to keep my makeup on longer and is helping control my face from getting too oily. But I gave it 2 stars since it did not help coverup my scars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The concealer was nice and creamy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover up a flat quarter-sized keloid scar on my chest since I was to wear a low v-neck bridesmaid dress for a friend's wedding. The concealer was nice and creamy. It did a great job of concealing the redness of the scar, although you can still tell the scar is there but it looked much better which was what I was hoping for. I am Asian with slightly tan skin and the concealer in medium blended in just right. I also didn't have to re-apply the concealer throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Meekosan

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To for Concealer
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this for the last 4 years and I love it. It has good coverage and I feel like I'm helping to heal my spots as I'm concealing. I was having a lot of stress-based acne from school, but this helped keep up my confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Brehm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite concealer ever. Covers well. Helps heal any wounds, pimples etc. goes on smooth. Been buying this for almost three years!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s OK. Definitely not worth the price though. Also I think the medium shade is a bit on the light side.
customer_reviews.author: Nina L

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer!
customer_reviews.text: I received this in an ipsy bag a year or so ago and I only have to use so little that I just now ran out and reordered a new tube! Matches my skin perfectly and almost gives an airbrush look! Not cakes at all! Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: M&S

customer_reviews.title: Worth I!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way ! Great that it helps clear your skin while covering. Do wish they made a paler hade though
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Black

customer_reviews.title: ... a tiny bit dark for me but I still love it. I just mix a little lighter concealer
customer_reviews.text: A tad of an orange hint and a tiny bit dark for me but I still love it . I just mix a little lighter concealer. I couldn’t live without this
customer_reviews.author: K.A

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a crap
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt cover tattoos, doesnt stay. not worth the waste of time or money. maybe as foundation it works but not for covering anything important for more than 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Julia Brindle

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is heavy duty! Works great to cover imperfections on the face
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Does not hide bruises.
customer_reviews.text: Does not hide bruises. Color is way off. Looks caked on no matter how much blending. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda D'Avanzo

customer_reviews.title: I don't find this product blends well with my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't find this product blends well with my skin tone. I am very pale with warm undertones and it seems to clearly not blend with my skin tone. I also don't think it covered my hyper-pigmentation very well either. I will probably use up my concealer but probably won't buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Works very good. I use it to cover my dark under eyes & also a little spot where a curling iron burned me
customer_reviews.author: Cherri

customer_reviews.title: By far the best concealer I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: By far the best concealer I have ever purchased. I love that I can put it over a zit and not worry how big it will get throughout the day if anything.. It just does its job.
customer_reviews.author: akim.nyc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I just.got.this today. I have bad hereditary dark circles. I have tried everything under the stars for them. This is THE BEST yet!!! Wow! What a difference!! Does not feel drying either. Very smooth application!!! Very very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this on my daughters acne and now I use it on her to cover up the old marks. Have been using it under makeup for a couple of years now. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: It conceals!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a concealer that covers acne, blemishes, scars, and dark spots in one application. Works easily with powder foundations and contouring.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Cover scars on my forearm well enough. It’s not perfect but it makes them unnoticeable unless you really look.
customer_reviews.author: J Lynn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this in my Ipsy box and fell in love with it. By far my favorite concealer ever!! This .34 ounce size lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: TScom

customer_reviews.title: It covers brown spots!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad brown spots from radiation treatment years ago- they get worse in the sunlight! This works to cover them!
customer_reviews.author: D. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, but I will keep it to use under ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very small tube of concealer, but nothing too special about it. I bought it to cover some spider veins on my legs, but it's way too light. Disappointed, but I will keep it to use under eye, or to cover a zit. It does cover very well.
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff! A little bit goes a long way. The first time I bought the smaller tube and then I was sad when I ran out of it and ordered the big tube this time..
customer_reviews.author: Mar Quise

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Coverage is great! It’s not oily or sticky. It’s perfect especially in this Texas heat in the Summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer
customer_reviews.text: This concealer works. It's about the same price as the name brand concealer since this last me a whole lot longer. I only have to use a little to cover a spot. Good for covering up imperfections but not the best for under eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Clabo

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, really covers up bad skin scars or marks. A little drop is all you need. Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: marianne f

customer_reviews.title: Does not offer complete coverage
customer_reviews.text: Small amount - fades the boo boo but does not camofluage it.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Very effective cover up
customer_reviews.text: This is a very effective product. I originally received this from Ipsy and bought gut this full size. It blends well to cover blemishes and seems to help them improve faster than without it.
customer_reviews.author: Livia F.

customer_reviews.title: Great concept!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I wanted something that would help heal but would hide the terrible bruise I had on my leg. Only wish they had a bigger variety of shades which I am sure they eventually will. No more Neosporin and then concealer!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: The best concealer for a quick fix. I know it’s for “boo boos” but I use it on my face and it blends so well and a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: For small, shallow scarring only
customer_reviews.text: Not a heavy cover up for larger scars. But a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: doc

customer_reviews.title: The best cover up I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: The best cover up I have ever used. It is amazing! A little goes a long way. It covers my facial scars and dark spots well. Very happy I finally found something that works.
customer_reviews.author: John Uramkin

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter on recommendation from a family member who had good results. So far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter on recommendation from a family member who had good results. So far, my daughter's face is clearing up nicely and very quickly.Will continue to purchase for her.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I do like this concert up, however I was unaware the tube is so tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Covers up bruises really well. When I work in the yard, I sometimes get bruises on my forearms. It's makes me look like an old man. This product covers them up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is pretty good. But there is a better but more ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is pretty good. But there is a better but more expensive option, which is the Keromask Camouflage Cream.
customer_reviews.author: CoolieDude

customer_reviews.title: Not Effective
customer_reviews.text: Does not cover up as well as I'd hoped based on previous reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci Cooper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! Switching whatever type of makeup I have to this brand. Blends so easily, even if shading is off from your pigment, easy to cover with your own foundation. Highly suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It really does cover small broken capillaries on the face. I was so surprised!!!!
customer_reviews.author: FiFiFranklin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, perfect! Smacked my head & ended up with two huge black eyes & nose! This product covered it all up! I feel abnormal again! Seriously, best concealor out there! Fair skin with huge black marks.....vanished!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I highly recommend. A little goes a long way. I will reorder this from Alexa!
customer_reviews.author: StaceyB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite consealer. It give a medium to sheer coverage, blends well, and is very light on the skin. The smaller bottle lasts me several months and I use it daily for small blemishes. A little goes a long way. It does not make me break out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cover up/concealer I have ever used. I use it under my eyes to conceal my dark circles, I use it on blemishes, I use it on ANYTHING I want covered, and it does it. And to think it gives nutrients to your skin while it works so beautifully! I am truly grateful to have found this product and it is definitely worth the money for the magic it works.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Rutlen

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Arrived quickly and safely! Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has terrible breakouts and this cover up has taken them from weeklong problems to clear in less than 2 days. She has very sensitive skin and has no problems with this product at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beki

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealer! It covers blemishes and under eye circles very well and doesn’t take very much at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Register

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I do not use it ad a boo-boo cover up. Although it says not for under eyes, its the best concealer I've ever bought.

customer_reviews.title: Not so great at concealing
customer_reviews.text: Does not provide the coverage I had hoped for in a "boo boo" concealer but has a nice texture and feels good on my skin. If only it actually concealed....
customer_reviews.author: Unsolicited Advice

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite make up products right now
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite make up products right now!! It literally hides any blemish and you can use it under your normal powder foundation without any cakey look or feel. Its so smooth and I cannot rave about it enough!
customer_reviews.author: Bowie M

customer_reviews.title: The best concealer
customer_reviews.text: I got this first in an ipsy bag or something similar and was hooked. It covers extremely well without looking like spackle. I use it under my eyes as I get terrible dark circles.
customer_reviews.author: Maren L

customer_reviews.title: Takes a little more for really dark spots.
customer_reviews.text: My doggies bruised my arm in their excitement. Good for covering those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special... certainly not worth the price. My shear cover concealer works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a good concealer, though so far I don't see that ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good concealer, though so far I don't see that it's any better than major brands which are cheaper per ounce. I use it on mosquito bites in areas where I don't tan at all. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Moore

customer_reviews.title: Needs staying power
customer_reviews.text: After an hour or two it had worn off and looked like I wasn’t wearing concealer at all. It does go on smoothly and feels nice on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: jessiebelle092

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this stuff!!! I use it as my every day foundation and my skin has never looked better!! I've had no break outs since I started using this, and it lasts 2-3 months!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage for blemishes and scratches
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my teenage daughter and she loves it! It does not cause breakouts and the coverage is great for blemishes and scratches from sports, etc. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LSA

customer_reviews.title: absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: A little pea-sized amount covers almost my whole face. It is has absolutely amazing coverage, but also goes on smoothly/stays on all day. This is a new staple in my makeup bag
customer_reviews.author: helenh

customer_reviews.title: Best Concealor
customer_reviews.text: Still the best concealer I have ever purchased, but wish it came with more skin tone options.
customer_reviews.author: ecstaticme08

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I got a sample in my Ipsy clam bag and fell in live with it. I use as as my over all concealer and it's the best that I've found so far. I don't use foundation and this covers all my flaws!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Martin

customer_reviews.title: Never Going Back!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only concealer I use! It covers so well and blends perfectly with my skin. It's perfect, and a little goes a looooong way. I'm never using anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Petermann

customer_reviews.title: I will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for covering up my acne that I don't want everyone to see.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: and I fell in love with it
customer_reviews.text: I first received a sample of this concealer when I was receiving monthly Ipsy bags, and I fell in love with it! One tube lasted me about a year! The color blends perfectly with my skin tone, and it applies easily.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED THE CONCEALER, IT REALLY COVERS UP MY SCARS. I TOTALLY RECOMMEND IT.
customer_reviews.author: Grace T. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Amazing concealer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It covers up all the imperfections with just a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: marangelly

customer_reviews.title: Not for white spots
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. I have white piment and this actually made it look worse. May be fine for other types of coverage but not white spots.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: You need this- thank you Ipsy
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Received it in my Ipsy bag over a year ago and have been buying/using it ever since. It is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Sizzle

customer_reviews.title: Makes bruises disappear!
customer_reviews.text: Covers up bruises that come so easily as you get older, and a tube of this product last a long time! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I received this item in my BirchBox subscription and had to buy it again. It matched well with my skin tone and did not look Casey with my foundation as I find many concealers do. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: StephieH

product_meta.title: Boo-Boo Cover-Up Concealer, Medium, 0.34 Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:0.34| Color:MediumSpeed up the process of healing while looking your best with Boo-Boo Cover Up Medium from Boo-Boo Cover-Up. This innovative formula for medium complexions seamlessly conceals bug bites, scars, acne and other imperfections while powerful healing ingredients help with the repair of your skin. Now you can look your best with Boo-Boo Cover-Up while you heal.
feature_bullets: Innovative formula that provides great coverage for scratches and other blemishes while healing
Contains aloe, chamomile, green tea, tea tree oil, and vitamin E
Can be used for both face and body
